name: build-docker-hub

on:
  workflow_run:
    workflows: ["ci-pipeline"]
    types: [completed]

jobs:
  push_docker_hub:
    name: Push Docker image to Docker Hub
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    # CRITICAL: Only push if the CI pipeline actually passed
    if: ${{ github.event.workflow_run.conclusion == 'success' }}
    
    steps:
      - name: Check out the repo
        uses: actions/checkout@v4 # Reverted to v4 (v6 is not yet available)

      - name: Log in to Docker Hub 
        uses: docker/login-action@v3
        with: 
          username: ${{ secrets.DOCKER_USERNAME }}
          password: ${{ secrets.DOCKER_PASSWORD }}
          
      - name: Extract metadata (tags, labels) for Docker
        id: meta
        uses: docker/metadata-action@v5
        with:
          images: ${{ secrets.DOCKER_USERNAME }}/html_nginx_2
          # Adds 'latest' and the commit SHA as tags automatically
          tags: |
            type=raw,value=latest
            type=sha

      - name: Build and push Docker image
        uses: docker/build-push-action@v6
        with:
          context: .
          push: true
          # Note: metadata-action handles the image name + tags together
          tags: ${{ steps.meta.outputs.tags }}
          labels: ${{ steps.meta.outputs.labels }}
